Name: Lifespan 5seconds
About the game: Lifespan 5seconds is a stage clear action puzzle game made by PixelGameMakerMV. Players can jump and hit a shot. The feature of this game is to generate a block with a lifespan of 5 seconds when the shot hits the wall. You will exploit this shot and capture all 50 stages!
